field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: size
field.label: Choose Icon Size
field.description: Choose the size of your icons (Typically between 24 and 64 pixels).

field.name: align
field.label: Align Icons
field.description: Choose to align the icons to the left to the right or in the center.

field.name: effect
field.label: Special Effect
field.description: Choose which type of special effect you would like to display or choose none.

field.name: backcolor
field.label: Background color of module
field.description: The background color of the module in HEX (ex. #ffffff default white).

field.name: highlight
field.label: Color to highlight your icons
field.description: Choose a bright color to highlight your icons in HEX (ex. #fff000 default is yellow - for highlight effect).

field.name: margin
field.label: Space between icons
field.description: Enter the amount of space you would like between icons (Typically between 1 and 3).

field.name: rotatedeg
field.label: Degrees to Rotate your icons
field.description: Choose the number of degrees to rotate your icons.

field.name: text
field.label: Hover Text
field.description: Text to display when you mouseover the icon. ex: 'Follow us on' (The icon name will be apended to the end of this text to display ex: 'Follow us on Twitter'

field.name: rsstext
field.label: Hover Text for RSS Icon
field.description: If you are using the RSS Icon, add the text to display when you mouseover the icon. ex: 'Subscribe to our Feed' (This module does not generate a feed, it only provides an RSS icon to link to your feed)

field.name: target
field.label: Target
field.description: Choose to open the link in a new browser window or the same window

field.name: robots
field.label: Include the rel='nofollow' link attribute
field.description: Search Engines that support the rel='nofollow' attribute exclude these links from their ranking calculation

field.name: credits
field.label: Support the Author?
field.description: This option allows you to show/hide a link back to our website.
